title: The Question of Lay Analysis:
description: Other edition of 9780393005035 can be found hereFreud believed that a medical education was not necessarily useful to, and might even impede, the psychoanalyst, but he met strenuous resistance among his followers, particularly in the United States. In The Question of Lay Analysis he set forth his views on the issue. The book makes its point energetically and in addition serves as an informal popularization of psychoanalytic ideas.
author: Sigmund Freud
